name: Prayer Circle Peril
description:
The cultists have gathered in the deep dungeon this Halloween night to perform their ritual. Guide their prayer circle through the dungeon. Light fire pits by putting them in the center of the prayer circle. Win by lighting all of the pits, but be careful. The Dungeon has its own perils!

Controls:

Pan Camera: A,S,W,D

ZoomIn/Out: Scroll wheel

Move Prayer Circle: Click and drag on pink nodes
